title: Nominal GDP counts goods, services produced

content.question: The nominal gross domestic product of China in 2010 is a measure of the total value of which of the following in 2010 ?

choices.label: Financial assets, including stocks, in China
Firms located within the borders of China
Final goods and services consumed in China
Final goods and services produced within the borders of China
Final goods and services exported by China to the rest of the world

content.answer: Final goods and services produced within the borders of China

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
